Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
STATUS : OK 24-10-2005
if you made a change to this program - make sure that the changes you made
are relevant for all the programs that call this prog.
as for 04/2006 it is BID700 and BXA470
23.04.2014 GB SCR18849 Added Step 4 – Keep only real invoices
18.03.2014 GB SCR18783 Step1: Extended selection of INVO with DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC <> 14
15.02.2014 GB SCR18725 Extended range of selection with INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 14 if INVO_ADMNO = 3
16.09.2013 SH SCR Step1 Changed INVO selection if PI.includeM.Code/draft_invoices = ‘false’ (INVO_MARKCODESPEC tests)
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
21.05.2010 AK SCR15553 extended pi.callProg to A50
14.08.209 AK SCR14817 only added some remarks - no functionality change
14.07.2008 EMB SCR12482 Changed direct SQL statement. Insert into contains field names now.
29.01.2008 AK SCR13337 excluding pament code 14 if pi.includeM.Code/draft_=false
07.12.2007 AK SCR13193adjust prog to work without SQLunion (performance problem)
09.06.2006 AK SCR11449 exclude drafts from selection (if pi.includeM.Code/draft_invoices = faLse
03.05.2006 AK SCR11108 change the name of pi.AACTUAL I/H to pi.AACTUAL I/H/C
and added the parameter po_tot_balance_after deduction
16.04.2006 AK SCR10839 adjust program to BXA740
only program BID700 can leave this parameter empty
check if there is already invoce Information for the Debtor
Creating outstanding invocie information for debtor (if it still not exist)
Step 6
after runing task - "Deducting total credit" the value of
v.TotalOutstandingCreditNotes OR v.TotalOutstandingDebitNotes wil be zero

ExpSyntax.val: 'or case when INVO_ADMNO = 3 then INVO_MARKCODESPEC end = 14'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
INSERT INTO :1/TDIV ( TDIV_CALLPROG, TDIV_DEBC_NO, TDIV_INVO_NO, TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, TDIV_INVO_DUEDATE) SELECT ':3', INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_NO, INVO_AACTUAL:4, INVO_DUEDATE
FROM :1/INVO
WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0

Text.val: get total credit notes and then delete the row from temp table

SQL_STMT_U.val: DELETE FROM :1/TDIV WHERE TDIV_CALLPROG=':4' and TDIV_DEBC_NO=:2 and exists(select * from :1/INVO left outer join :1/MARK on MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC where INVO_NO = TDIV_INVO_NO and (INVO_CODPAYMENTDIFF='Y' or INVO_CODDISCOUNTDIFFERENCE='Y' or INVO_CODDRAFT ='Y' or INVO_PAYMENTCODE = 14 or case when INVO_MARKCODESPEC > 0 then MARK_URSLIST end = 'Y' :3))
